input_text:
Job Title: Regional Manager

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Company Overview:MiMutual Mortgage is a family owned, direct lender celebrating our 30th year of business in 2022! As a mid-sized lender, we can offer the flexibility of a small lender with the perks of a large lender. Our team members have the ability to be a part of the conversation rather than being forced to work within strict parameters often found in larger organizations.
Job Summary:Our MiMutual Mortgage is growing and you will be a part of that growth! As the Regional Sales Manager you will be responsible for growing a specified territory and efficient daily operation of their assigned branches, including but not limited to, operations, product sales, recruiting, and customer service in accordance with the Company’s strategic objectives. The Regional Sales Manager promotes the sales and service culture through effective coaching, guidance and staff motivation, and achieves sales goals of branches through new business sales, referrals and retention of relationships
Benefits of Joining the MiMutual Family:Our marketing team offers a large array of marketing and advertising materialsOur operations team has offices across all three time zonesWe offer our sales team a full tool belt of products including QN and NonQM, bond and JumboYou will have the flexibility to work in office or remotelyDirect access to executive management
﻿What we are looking for in our Regional Manager:Effectively coach and develop branch staff through selling techniques, marketing ideas, developing new lead sources, and closing mortgagesOversee the marketing initiatives for branches by working with appropriate Company channels (e.g., Marketing and Compliance) to promote and maximize sales opportunities while ensuring compliance is followedMonitor assigned branches sales goals and sales activities by analyzing and documenting trends and communicating sales “best practices” to Branch Managers and Producing Sales ManagersEnsure that assigned branches maintain a high level of internal and external appearance for customers while following Company brand standardsAct as a resource to Branch Managers, Producing Sales Managers, and/or Loan Officers by being knowledgeable of company products, policies and procedures, underwriting requirements and systems utilizationFive + years previous experience in a similar rolePrevious experience within the mortgage industry

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Regional Manager
output_json.summary: Responsible for growing a specified territory, efficient daily operation of assigned branches, including operations, product sales, recruiting, and customer service.
job_responsibilities: Efficient daily operation of assigned branches
Effective coaching and development of branch staff
Resource for Branch Managers, Producing Sales Managers, and Loan Officers
benefits: Large array of marketing and advertising materials
Offices across all three time zones
Full tool belt of products including QN and NonQM, bond and Jumbo
Flexibility to work in office or remotely
output_json.company_information: MiMutual Mortgage is a family-owned, direct lender celebrating its 30th year of business in 2022. As a mid-sized lender, they offer flexibility and perks typically found in larger lenders.
